```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(httr)
library(gt)
library(tidyverse)
library(glue)

###importar dados ###
calendar <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/drdivinopolis/blogdaregional/master/data/calendar2021.csv", sep = ";", encoding = "Latin-1")
calendar$TROCA.DE.SABERES = NULL
calendar <- calendar [-c(29:1015),]

tab1 <- 
  calendar %>%
  tab_header(title = "Calendário de atividades - 2021")


```
